sentences.en: All kinds of remarkable things began to happen.
sentences.cn: 开始发生各种不寻常的事。

sentences.en: He made a remarkable recovery from a shin injury.
sentences.cn: 他的胫骨伤恢复得相当不错。

sentences.en: He showed remarkable endurance throughout his illness.
sentences.cn: 他在整个生病期间表现出非凡的忍耐力。

sentences.en: Her mental capacity and temperament are as remarkable as his.
sentences.cn: 她的才智和气质和他一样出众。

sentences.en: His son was praised for speeches of remarkable fluency.
sentences.cn: 他儿子因为发言流畅自然而得到了表扬。

sentences.en: I owe the restoration of my hearing to this remarkable new technique.
sentences.cn: 我之所以能恢复听觉完全是因为采用了这项非凡的新技术.

sentences.en: It is quite remarkable that doctors have been so wrong about this.
sentences.cn: 医生们对此有过如此错误的认识真是很不寻常。

sentences.en: It's more than his physical stature that makes him remarkable.
sentences.cn: 他的与众不同之处不光是他的身高。

sentences.en: Many birds have a remarkable homing instinct .
sentences.cn: 很多鸟类具有了不起的返回原地的本能。

sentences.en: Relentless in his pursuit of quality, his technical ability was remarkable.
sentences.cn: 对质量孜孜不倦的追求使他的技能出类拔萃。

sentences.en: She has made remarkable headway in her writing skills.
sentences.cn: 她在写作技巧方面有了长足进步.

sentences.en: She showed remarkable courage when she heard the bad news.
sentences.cn: 她听到这坏消息时,表现出非凡的勇气.

sentences.en: The day's events were a remarkable volte-face.
sentences.cn: 当日发生的事件是一次惊人的大转折。

sentences.en: There was a remarkable resem-blance between him and Pete.
sentences.cn: 他和皮特之间有着惊人的相似之处。

sentences.en: This remarkable technology provides far greater clarity than conventional x-rays.
sentences.cn: 这项卓越技术的清晰度比常规的X光高得多。

words.tran_cn: 显著地；非常地；引人注目地

trans.tran_cn: 异常的，引人注目的，，卓越的，显著的，非凡的，非常（好）的
trans.tran_en: unusual or surprising and therefore deserving attention or praise
